definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: The "Foreign Debts Registration Certificate" shall be formulated and issued by the SAEC in a unified way.
sentences.chinese: 國家外匯管理局統一制定和簽發《外債登記證》。

sentences.english: The SAEC and The Banks Concerned Would Keep What You Reported Confidential.
sentences.chinese: 國家外匯管理局和有關銀行將爲您的申報內容保密。

sentences.english: However, the comments by Guan Tao of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange were quickly removed from the website at his request.
sentences.chinese: 然而，國家外匯管理局的官員關濤的評論被很快刪除。

sentences.english: A debenture issue agreement which is signed without the approval of the State Administration of Foreign Exchange shall be invalid.
sentences.chinese: 未經國家外匯管理局批准，擅自簽訂的發債協議無效。
